paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: experienced syncope and diagnosed with LQTS-2
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient P1 experienced syncope at age 25 and was diagnosed with LQTS-2 at age 28.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQTS-2 after family history of sudden cardiac death
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P2 was diagnosed with LQTS-2 at age 31 after a family history of sudden cardiac death.

individual_records.phenotype_details: no symptoms but carries the variant
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P3 carries the variant but is currently unaffected.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQTS-2 after experiencing arrhythmia
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P4 was diagnosed with LQTS-2 at age 38 after experiencing arrhythmia.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays showed altered gating properties in the L524R mutant.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance data is based on a small cohort.
key_quotes: The patient P1 experienced syncope at age 25 and was diagnosed with LQTS-2 at age 28.
Patient P2 was diagnosed with LQTS-2 at age 31 after a family history of sudden cardiac death.

tables_processed.table_caption: Fitted values for G-V and voltage-dependence of inactivation

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
